experimentid.description: Submitter-assigned symbolic identifier for this experiment

challenge_id.description: Challenge to which this entry is being submitted. Must be a value specified in https://lrgasp.github.io/lrgasp-submissions/docs/metadata-identifiers.html#challenge-identifiers

data_category.description: Type of read data used by the entry. Must be a value specified in https://lrgasp.github.io/lrgasp-submissions/docs/metadata-identifiers.html#data-categories

samples.description: Identifier of the type of samples used by the entry. Must be a value specified in https://lrgasp.github.io/lrgasp-submissions/docs/metadata-identifiers.html#sample-identifiers

species.description: Species on which the experiment was run. Must be a value specified in https://lrgasp.github.io/lrgasp-submissions/docs/metadata-identifiers.html#species-identifiers

library_preps.description: Identifier of the type of library preparation(s) used by the entry. Must be a value specified in https://lrgasp.github.io/lrgasp-submissions/docs/metadata-identifiers.html#library-prep

platforms.description: Identifier of the sequencing platform used by the entry. Must be a value specified in https://lrgasp.github.io/lrgasp-submissions/docs/metadata-identifiers.html#sequencing-platform

libraries.description: List of LRGASP RNA-Seq file accessions used in the experiment, as found in https://lrgasp.github.io/lrgasp-submissions/docs/rnaseq-data-matrix.html

extra_libraries.description: List of non-LRGASP libraries accessions that were used.

software.description: List of software used by the pipeline

notes.description: Any note the submitter wants to input about the experiment. Should not exceed 280 characters.
